^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

BootOrder.description: A reference to the BootSources settings associated with this system.
BootOrder.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a link to a resource of type BootSources that lists the BootSources settings for this system.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

DellComputerSystem.description: This resource contains the Dell specific Redfish implementation for ComputerSystem.
DellComputerSystem.longDescription: This resource contains the Dell specific Redfish implementation for ComputerSystem.
